Data Fields
UartSci_DriverDMA_t Struct Reference

SCI Driver DMA Block. More...

Data Fields

UartSci_HwCfg * ptrHwCfg
 This is a pointer to the hardware configuration.
 
DMA_CtrlPktParams rxDMACtrlPktParams
 DMA Control Packet Parameters which is used to configure the receive DMA channel. This is applicable & initialized only if the UART instance is configured to operate in DMA mode.
 
volatile bool isRxDMACompleted
 Flag which is used to indicate if the receive DMA operation has been completed or not. This is used only in the DMA mode.
 
volatile bool rxPollingMode
 Polling Mode flag: More...
 
DMA_CtrlPktParams txDMACtrlPktParams
 DMA Control Packet Parameters which is used to configure the transmit DMA channel. This is applicable & initialized only if the UART instance is configured to operate in DMA mode.
 

Detailed Description

SCI Driver DMA Block.

The structure is used to hold all the pertinent information with respect to the UART DMA.

Field Documentation

volatile bool UartSci_DriverDMA_t::rxPollingMode

Polling Mode flag:

  • TRUE: Indicates that the callee is polling till the DMA operation is complete.
  • FALSE: Indicates that the callee is blocked till the DMA operation is complete
